subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Etymology 2
subSections.text: Originally a compound of {{etyl|ojp|ja|sort=こもこも}} elements {{compound|ja|sort=こもこも|此|tr1=ko|t1=this|も|tr2=mo|t2=too|此|tr3=ko|t3=this|も|tr4=mo|t4=too}}. Appears as ''komokomo'' in older texts, evolving into ''komogomo'' in modern Japanese.

subSections.title: Adverb
Usage notes
subSections.text: Most often seen spelled in hiragana as {{l|ja|こもごも}}. May also be spelled variously as {{l|ja|交交}}, {{l|ja|交}}, {{l|ja|更}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|さが}}

# [[nature]], [[personality]]
# [[fate]], [[destiny]]
# a [[habit]], [[custom]], or [[practice]]
# the [[good]] and [[bad]] of a person; especially, one's [[fault|faults]]

subSections.title: Synonyms
Etymology 4
subSections.text: From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=しょう}}, deriving from the meaning of {{m|en|with}} from the way that a [[minister]] would always be with their [[lord]]. {{l|ja|sc=Latn|漢音|Kan'on}}, so likely a later borrowing than the ''sō'' reading.

subSections.title: Suffix
Etymology 5
subSections.text: From {{etyl|ltc|ja|sort=そう}}. {{l|ja|sc=Latn|呉音|Goon}}, so likely an earlier borrowing than the ''shō'' reading.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|そう|hhira=さう}}

# [[appearance]], how something [[look|looks]]
# an [[aspect]] of something
#: {{ja-usex|大%自%然 の 色々 な '''相'''|だい%し%ぜん の いろいろ な '''そう'''|various '''aspects''' of nature}}
# {{lb|ja|sort=そう|grammar}} [[grammatical]] [[aspect]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=そう|physics}} a [[phase]], as of [[matter]]
# {{lb|ja|sort=そう|ikebana}} the central supporting [[branch]] of an [[ikebana]] [[arrangement]]
